website_summaries.verdict: Made in the U.S.A. and certified organic, charcoal and bamboo work together to create a gentle and effective soap that addresses multiple skin ailments.
pros: Great for all skin types, including sensitive skin
washes away cleanly with no residue
Removes even the most stubborn makeup
Has a nice, light grapefruit scent
Works wonders on acne without chemicals
cons: May leave streaks on light-colored tiles and on white washcloths, so rinse off any residue immediately after use

customer_reviews.title: my face broke out worse than it has been in probably 6 years
customer_reviews.text: As a 22 year old who still struggles with acne and large pores, I was excited to try a product so well reviewed. Unfortunately, after 1.5 weeks of washing with this twice a day (always followed with moisturizer), my face broke out worse than it has been in probably 6 years. I stopped using it immediately and even after two weeks the break out is still healing. Also it dried my skin badly, no matter how much lotion I used. Glad it worked for some of you! But it didn't work for me!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy L. Haslam

customer_reviews.title: Pulls out toxins
customer_reviews.text: I am assuming the charcoal is pulling out toxins for ice been using this as a face wash for a month and I'm starting to break out in those sit under the surface pimples. I have mostly blemish free skin and only use gentle cleansers for up keep. 3 stars because it's making me break out with acne and I prefer a face wash just to clean and keep blemishes away.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie Seiber

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was doing a clarity cleanse for my body before the holidays. My face started to breakout, and I realized - the largest organ in the body is the skin. If any other part of your body isn’t functioning properly, from your gut, to your brain, it can show up on your skin because your pores get clogged up with toxic crap. It took a while but I found SAPO Organic Bamboo Charcoal Soap. By far the better charcoal soaps. I use it in the shower instead of shower gel. Great lather and the bar doesn't melt to nothing! Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: It worked for my daughter!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter tried everything short of a prescription for bad acne. This soap was a last resort before the dermatologist. It worked wonderfully! The process has taken several months but we saw results within a week. She used it in conjunction with a face mask twice a day every day. The acne is almost gone. Now to clear up the redness left behind! Very happy with this soap! It's worth a try if you are struggling with acne.
customer_reviews.author: M. Meza

customer_reviews.title: ... of the reviews and they were all positive and fantastic. Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of the reviews and they were all positive and fantastic. Unfortunately, maybe it's my skin or just personal tastes, but I did not like it. I didn't see any changes in my skin or any decrease in my acne, if anything there was an increase. I also read that due to its thickness, this bar of soap last longer, I didn't find that true. I'm sure the soap works amazing for a lot of people, but i'm just not one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Kim B.

customer_reviews.title: My Go-To Cleansing Bar
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive, combination skin. Once a month during my cycle, I would get a single pimple on the side of the face. A couple of years ago - I had a strange hormonal breakout on my entire face that drove me to change my entire beauty routine. Ive been 100% organic since and this soap bar was a life saver. Breakout cleared in 3 weeks of using this bar and scars have all completed faded. I have not had a breakout since (NOT ONE PIMPLE). Cleanses makeup off easily, detoxifies, and leaves my face squeaky clean without leaving it too dry.
customer_reviews.author: lol

customer_reviews.title: Great Everyday Soap
customer_reviews.text: This soap is really nice. Not sure if it is responsible for clearing my acne because I have changed lots of aspects of my lifestyle, but my skin has certainly cleared up in the past month and a half (I've been using this for at least two months now). It smells nice and keeps my face feeling squeaky clean!
customer_reviews.author: Lea Robinson

customer_reviews.title: I bought this soap for my boyfriend who struggles with ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this soap for my boyfriend who struggles with acne. It has been incredible! He isn't completely clear of all acne but a HUGE improvement! Even his older scars seem to be fading. I am also using this soap on my face now. I will say that it can sting a bit if left on your face too long, so rinse right away.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Bennett

customer_reviews.title: It lathers nicely and smells good
customer_reviews.text: Not doing much for my acne. It lathers nicely and smells good. I keep my bar outside of the shower on a shelf and just bring it into the shower to wash my face so it's lasting quite a long time which is nice. I've changed my skin care routine so many times looking to cure my acne and to fade my acne scars but not luck.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Excellent face wash
customer_reviews.text: I am so grateful for an affordable organic charcoal facial soap. This soap does wonders for my skin making it youthful and glowing. The charcoal draws out any impurities. You can’t beat the price either.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Q

customer_reviews.title: Soap works great for my oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I use this soap because it cleans my skin and doesn't overdry it. I have the oily t zone skin and this soap helps me control the oil left over on my face after washing. Smooth and soft skin is only a few washes away. One downside is that they have some abrasive parts at first.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Birrueta

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I adore this soap! I have fought severe eczema my entire life. I'm currently going through topical steroid withdrawal, and this product is the only cleanser I can use that doesn't make me scream in pain. I love the smell too.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my face smooth, no break outs.
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap, have been using it for several years. Bar is small but it lasts a long time. I do switch up and use other soaps and they are all natural. I stop using drug store soaps almost 10 yrs.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: It smells lovely, but if you have severe eczema i can't recommend it. It actually felt like my skin was mildly burning while using it, and after a week i didn't see any signs of improvement, if anything it made it slightly worse. Everyone is different though when it comes to eczema, so if you only have mild eczema or less sensitive skin, then it may work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Theron Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this soap makes my very sensitive skin feel. Does not dry your skin, but doesn't leave a residue either -- just nice clean skin. I also gave a bar to my son to use for acne. I am definitely planning to keep using this soap.
customer_reviews.author: L. Coerr

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting great smelling
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many other similar types of soaps, however this one is different. I will still have a bar left after 2 weeks whereas most seem to disappear quickly. Smells good and keeps skin smooth and has not caused any breakouts. I reccomen!!!
customer_reviews.author: Russos

customer_reviews.title: Good natural clean with very subtle odor
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product is natural And cleans my body well. I have slight psoriasis and it was great for my skin. No strong scents or irritation. I would for sure buy it again soon! The only thing I didn’t like was that it works best with loofah/shower gloves. Otherwise it doesn’t lather too well. You don’t smell it with wash cloths, but you do with loofahs and shower gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Cotton

customer_reviews.title: Love this soap
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap! I have tried other organic soaps in the past and nothing makes my skin feel as good and soft as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: I had adult on-set acne and nothing would get rid ...
customer_reviews.text: I had adult on-set acne and nothing would get rid of it. Cleansing with this once a day has made all the difference in the world!
customer_reviews.author: Leila M.

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed the smell of the soap and it made my ...
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the smell of the soap and it made my skin feel great. Overall a good product for normal skin types. I have some back acne, but it was only able to clear it up partly through one complete use of a bar. I will need to switch to a bar more specific for back acne, but might consider coming back to charcoal soap if it clears up.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lah

customer_reviews.title: Best soap EVER
customer_reviews.text: Best product I’ve ever used for my combination skin that is also crazy sensitive and prone to breakouts of zits, eczema and hives. It clams my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Ann Weitz

customer_reviews.title: not as grapefruity as i thought but still smells great and has been great for my adult birth control ...
customer_reviews.text: not as grapefruity as i thought but still smells great and has been great for my adult birth control related acne. glad i ordered the four pack because everyone in my family stole a bar for themselves. plus u can always cut it into cubes to use at the gym or when traveling
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t up to par for me
customer_reviews.text: I really didn’t like this bar compared to beauty counters charcoal bar. It didn’t feel like it took away all the oil from my face and didn’t like the grapefruit scent too much.
customer_reviews.author: JEG

customer_reviews.title: but once it does it's great. Soap doesn't seem to wash away in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely different, takes some time to properly lather up, but once it does it's great. Soap doesn't seem to wash away in the showers as fast as others which is nice. The soap moisturizes, but would still recommend using a moisturizer as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful alternative to chemical cleansers!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Bought it for my 13 yr old daughter who's started struggling with acne.. I don't believe in using loads of chemicals on a child's face ( or an adult for that matter) so I wanted something natural, safe and chemical free! She loves the way it makes her skin feel, doesn't dry it out like typical acne cleansers.. It's only been a week, and she said there is a small improvement.. Even if it takes awhile, I'm glad to know I'm not feeding her skin full of bad, icky chemicals!
customer_reviews.author: jwilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Never switching back to regular soap again!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this soap for almost a year and I love it so much I have it on auto ship! My skin feels moisturized and I never feel dry after drying off. My husband uses it as well . It helps with skin irritations and I sometimes use on my face for a squeaky clean feel
customer_reviews.author: Abbey H.

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Takes awhile to get through, helps clean my face and pores
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette K.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my face oil-free!
customer_reviews.text: This the first soap I have found in a very long time that works for my face. It keeps my face oil free & free from breakouts. I read an article once that suggested this soap, and they were right! Now this is all I will use for washing my face. I would recommend this soap to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Kay

customer_reviews.title: ... about 3 weeks or so and so far I love it. I use on my face
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about 3 weeks or so and so far I love it. I use on my face, as a nightly cleanser. My skin has been very clear, soft and my pores appear smaller since using. It's even keeping my skin clear since using loads of sunscreen and being out in the heat sweating during the day these past couple weeks. I will admit, I have pretty good/balanced skin anyways, but I do have my breakouts here and there and it seems to be keeping even those small little breakouts away. As long as it keeps performing this well for me, I will definitely purchase again and I would definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really really live this soap! It makes my ...
customer_reviews.text: I really really live this soap! It makes my skin feel so smooth & clean! It is a bit costly but after using it i can't see how i can go back to store brand soaps (dove, dial,etc.) Amazon outdid theirselve's again with this onr because there's no way i can find this in a local market! Thanks again Amazon!❤️
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin, but stains washcloth
customer_reviews.text: I like this soap it is great for my skin but it stains my washcloth dark. The soap is black and will stain your washcloth, I guess you can use a loofah or a dark color washcloth.
customer_reviews.author: Starlyn159

customer_reviews.title: This soap is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap so much. I’ve only been using it a few days, but I find it exceptionally moisturizing. My skin feels soft and clean after using it. I love that the smell is very mild...it doesn’t clash with body oils and body sprays I use after. I use this soap on my face and body. Will definitely be purchasing again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal-Marie

customer_reviews.title: cleared my melasma
customer_reviews.text: I bought this soap just to try. I have melasma on my face and chest, and this soap has almost erased the pigmentation. The only thing is, in my shower where the soap sits is black. But the black does come off with a little elbow grease.
customer_reviews.author: vapper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel on my fast. Makes it feel so soft
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: This soap is simply amazing! It has definitely helped my acne and feels ...
customer_reviews.text: This soap is simply amazing! It has definitely helped my acne and feels amazing on my face! I will definitely be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: alymar18

customer_reviews.title: This is a great soap for teenagers with acne
customer_reviews.text: My son has only been using this soap for 6 days and what a BIG difference it has made! This is a great soap for teenagers with acne. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Chad G.

customer_reviews.title: It’s cool
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s good. It seems to be lightening my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Karenza

customer_reviews.title: A return customer.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this soap. Cleans my face really well. I am getting older so harsh soaps damage my face, but this is a really good cleaner and really soft and gentle.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Great soap but too expensive and doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Its a great soap but it is too expensive and it finished within a week. If your able to do multiple soaps at a great price I don't want buying more
customer_reviews.author: Mirwais M.

customer_reviews.title: Skin feels great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap. Tried a few others, but my skin felt drier.
customer_reviews.author: angelcakes2

customer_reviews.title: Great soap
customer_reviews.text: Very nice soap and I feel like I’m doing something good for my skin when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Ayarb

customer_reviews.title: Just used for the first time! I cannot believe ...
customer_reviews.text: Just used for the first time! I cannot believe how smooth and clean my face feels! I will be ordering more for sure. Looking forward to trying it as a shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Love2bake

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing! I have or should I say had issues ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing! I have or should I say had issues with adult acne and within 3 days of using this product it has cleared up. The bumpiness in my skin is starting to clear up and become smooth as well. I will never use anything other than this product ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Best soap ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, I have eczema and psoriasis and it's amazing how great my skin feels after every shower, clean and soft without feeling tight or oily. I especially appreciate the subtle grapefruit scent as most organics go in for the stronger , tea tree oil etc that I always hate. Please hurry up and make some more, I don't want to have to find another brand!
customer_reviews.author: AMB

customer_reviews.title: Soap
customer_reviews.text: I had itching all over n with ''tis soap it's getting better w every shower.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: "This truly is a super soap! Great for your skin!"
customer_reviews.author: Judy Trenkle

customer_reviews.title: Best soap ever
customer_reviews.text: Best bar of soap I have ever used. The scent is super light but very good. Ithe left my skin so soft after just the first use. I'll definitely be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice, feels nice. Haven't had it long enough to determine if it is improving my skin or not.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Fahey

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this a few days now and so far it’s been wonderful. Doesn’t make my skin feel gross, smells good which I love because so many organic healthy soaps stink to me.
customer_reviews.author: Holly franklin

customer_reviews.title: Nice soap
customer_reviews.text: Smells lovely and works great, but a bit messy and leaves dark streaks that must be cleaned after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Katy L.

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive for this recipe. It melts away really fast.
customer_reviews.author: Badger

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping charcoal soap was the answer to my acne issues. It cleaned my face squeaky clean but unfortunately that wasn't a good thing because after 2 1/2 weeks of use I broke out on my cheeks and for head which never happens. I also ended up with a crazy amount of white heads on my chin and itchy dry patches around my mouth. I had to stop using it and return to the face wash I was using before which cleared up the break out this soap caused but still does nothing for my cystic acne. Oh well, my search continues.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this soap for few month, and it really cleared up my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It leaves my skin feeling soft and clean. I have noticed that my stubborn nose blackheads are less prominent. I think the best thing is the fact that this soap only has like 5 ingredients and they’re ones I can actually pronounce.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Worked
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter has eczema and ace, and within one week of using this soap on her face, I could see a big difference! So happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: a little drying but it helps my daughters acne. while on vacation i used this to wash my face and hair, i really like it and my hair feels much softer then it has in years
customer_reviews.author: ec

customer_reviews.title: I have normal skin and I do not feel like it is drying at all
customer_reviews.text: So far I am really enjoying this soap. I have normal skin and I do not feel like it is drying at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda E Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Seems to dry out the oil without ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Seems to dry out the oil without drying out my face.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Miller

customer_reviews.title: ... been using this soap for a week and it's great. It's gentle
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this soap for a week and it's great. It's gentle, yet cleans well and has a pleasant scent. If your skin is dry you will probably need to follow up with a moisturizer as I do. I would definitely order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Carey

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: It smells fine, and it doesn't stain black like I thought it could. It's a good soap.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Wartenberg

customer_reviews.title: Super Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap, it is everything that, is advertised. I produce lot of oils and it pulls it out. With normal soaps I can not get this. I plan on getting on a reg basis.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Cooks

customer_reviews.title: I just love that it's natural and detoxes while it cleans
customer_reviews.text: I feel so clean using this! I just love that it's natural and detoxes while it cleans!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and lathers nicely. It is a bit messy so make sure you have a good soap dish
customer_reviews.author: G.G.

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great soap, lathers easy and last long while making you skin feel smooth and clean. Definitely will keep coming back for more.

customer_reviews.title: Thought this would help with eczema
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to help with my eczema & it is causing me to be itchy on my arms & face.

customer_reviews.title: I haven’t see much of results but I started to ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t see much of results but I started to use the soap 3 days ago which I consider very small amount of time to give a feedback yet

customer_reviews.title: Deep cleans your faces and tightens pores.  Very clear / vibrant complexion!
customer_reviews.text: Facial soap....deep cleans and follow up with toner and moisturizer.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was left with some sort of film on my body after each use.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The scent is citrussy, and the bar doesn’t over dry. It’s great quality for price. My partner suffers from eczema so we needed to make a switch that we both could use and it’s very versatile for different skin concerns. It’s great.

customer_reviews.title: I had a reaction to this soap. Made my ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a reaction to this soap. Made my face red and bumpy. Took over a week to clear up.

customer_reviews.text: Smells great and gets my skin super clean even when I'm covered in grime.

customer_reviews.title: Will continue to purchased.

customer_reviews.title: A Must Try
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Product! I noticed a difference in my skin after just one use.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing. I have dry and flaky skin and this helps. It also smells great

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my faces feeling very clean without over drying. It also doesn't irritate my very sensitive skin.

customer_reviews.text: I'm always interested in trying natural products, but many end up lackluster or not worth the cost. This soap works up a nice lather and has a clean smell. A worthwhile purchase!

customer_reviews.title: It is mild but I wish there were more coal ...
customer_reviews.text: It is mild but I wish there were more coal particles in the soap to clear out the pores and scrub as well

customer_reviews.title: This is a great charcoal soap
customer_reviews.text: This is a great charcoal soap. Truly natural unlike most "natural" soaps. Really effective, pleasant to use, and an all around great answer in the bath.

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap so much,it leaves my skin so soft and smooth

customer_reviews.text: great complexion soap - keeps small breakouts on my face at bay.

customer_reviews.title: Only soap that I will use on my face
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Lathers up very well. Also, it will dry your skin out (that's with any kind of charcoal soap). Please use some type of mostirizer. I'm glad I found this. Great smell as well! I will be ordering again.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gets rid of dead wintery skin and doesn't dry me out.

customer_reviews.text: Smells nice but dried my skin. Maybe it'll work better on oily skin.

customer_reviews.text: Nice and mild. Not much fragrance which I prefer when using on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great! Just as described and doesn't dry my skin out like my previous wash.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nickerson

customer_reviews.title: Actually cleans off the chlorine smell from a pool
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is on a swim team and some days it's hard to ride home with her - the chlorine smell that sticks in her hair and skin is just noxious. Since she started using this soap - no smell. It is so nice! It's also helping with her acne - so win, win. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Erez

customer_reviews.title: Great soap and ethically made!
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap! Made in the US from ethically sourced ingredients (I emailed their customer service and asked about their palm oil) I feel confident using this soap. It works well for me, but like they said, definitely use a moisturizer after because it can dry out your skin. It doesn't turn everything black either like some people might think because it has charcoal. Overall I've had a great experience with this company (and their recyclable packaging!)
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: This turned my tub an unfortunate gray color that required ...
customer_reviews.text: This turned my tub an unfortunate gray color that required machine powered scrubbing to remove. Not worth the supposed (never experienced) benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Bixler

customer_reviews.title: Husband who does not like trying natural sustainable products - likes this soap
customer_reviews.text: I have been moving our household toward more environmentally friendly products - not just the ingredients but also the packaging. Those are the reasons I purchased this soap. It his made with sustainable, natural ingredients and comes packaged without any plastic. The soap lathers nicely, leaves my skin feeling skin without any residue. I can't use it on my face...not sure why but it causes my eyes to swell and itch but does not have the same effect on any other parts of my body. Another big plus for me - my husband uses it and likes it. It has been a tough sell for some other natural sustainable products but he likes how this soap cleans his skin.
customer_reviews.author: Nashoba

customer_reviews.title: Excellent acne treatment!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this soap for my teenager, suffering from acne. I have tried so many things OTC and RX, but nothing worked. Also tried Black African soap with no success. I have first purchased charcoal soap from Herbivore, but I like SAPO soap a lot better. I compared the ingredients of the two, and the activated charcoal is number one ingredient in SAPO. This soap has greatly improved my son's acne at just a fraction of what I had spent on all the acne treatments. Great product and great company standing behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalPharmacist

customer_reviews.title: Detoxifying and Calming
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple, widespread inflammatory skin conditions on my face and body: KP, rosacea, eczema... This soap doesn’t irritate any of them. It also doesn’t cure them. And it’s a bit too drying for my face—though when I’m more oily than usual I will use it to help mitigate that. I do follow up with treatment lotions. The smell is light (grapefruit) and am glad to have found this soap. While it’s not a panacea it does seem to help control irritation a bit, which is a relief when almost everything causes me more inflammation.
customer_reviews.author: TmT

customer_reviews.title: Love it! No more acne
customer_reviews.text: I have adult acne at 30. I thought I was past it. I have spent hundreds of dollars on product for "acne" I heard of charcoal and my mom always tell me I need organic.. this popped up for my search! I am so glad it did. My painful cystic acne have gone down to nothing and no new ones have came about! I will be ordering more! Can I reccomend maybe a holder for the soap so it doesn't spread bacteria.
customer_reviews.author: Keith and Kaytee Walters

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for dry skin, eczema, and acne!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this for my boyfriends cystic acne that he gets and its really improved his skin! I tried it on my dry skin and some spots where I had eczema and it's worked wonderfully. The bars don't last very long with everyday use if you leave it in the shower, so I would recommend placing it in a container when not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my teenage daughter. She has bumps on her arms that I could not find a product to help make them go away. Not only did this work on her arms, she uses it on her face too. I am amazed at how much of a difference this has made! I have purchased this multiple times. Each time the soap is the same. Smells great and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Nicole

customer_reviews.title: ... using this soap for a while now and I love it. This SAPO bar seems to be the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this soap for a while now and I love it. This SAPO bar seems to be the only face washing soap I can use without drying or breaking out my skin. I have also noticed almost immediately after I started washing with it that my pores have shrunk and my (adult) acne is now completely non-existant. I use this soap with a gentle brush with just enough pressure. I buy this soap in a 4-pack.
customer_reviews.author: SaraElle

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Nicest soap I have ever used for the eczema on my leg. It relieves the itch, and I do believe the patch is getting smaller. I will definitely buy this again and again as soon as it is back in stock! "I have some pretty severe eczema, and this soap has helped clear up completely some of the smaller patches on my hips and legs, and has lessened the severity of the really bad one."
customer_reviews.author: Eclipser

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad...
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good soap. It would have gotten a better rating/review if it didn't melt so much. I keep the soap in a covered dish, but it still melts too much when in use and not in use if even a bit of water gets on it. I'd say that because of this, this price is not worth it. But it is decent, though.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous smell! I like it so far.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my husband has a dry skin problem and been looking for more natural soaps and such. It arrived well packaged and fast, it seems to be completely natural and has a great scent! I really loved the scent and will be buying this again in the near future :) Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Cecy ZO

product_meta.title: SAPO Bamboo Charcoal Soap Bar - Certified Organic Ingredients 100% Natural - Moisturizing Detoxifying Face & Body Cleanser - For Acne, Psoriasis, Eczema, Dry Sensitive Skin - USA Handmade - 4 Oz Each
feature_bullets: 100% ALL NATURAL - Have Peace of Mind with USDA Certified Organic Ingredients Handmade Right Here in USA.
GENTLE & MOISTURIZING - Leave Your Skin (Face & Body) Feeling Fresh, Clean, Soft, Supple, and Moisturized. Foams Well and Washes Away With No Residue. Great For People With Sensitive Skin.
HELPS WITH SKIN CONDITIONS - Acne, Breakouts, Psoriasis, Eczema (Due to Ingredients Such as Oatmeal Powder, Sea Salt, Bamboo Charcoal, and Shea Butter)

ACTIVATED BAMBOO CHARCOAL SOAP - This Special Ingredient Gently Exfoliates and Detoxifies. It Gets Rid of Dirt, Debris, Impurities, and Dead Skin. Bamboo Charcoal Has Been Used In Asia for Thousands of Years to Make Soap.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - One Year No Questions Asked Money-Back Guarantee.
